Detailed Description

DBUS listener and signal abstraction.

Author:
Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>
Date:
2005-10-02
This module handles all th low-level glib DBUS API, and provides the high level hooks into the gpm_object to send signals, and call methods on the gpm_object.

Todo:
Get the DBUS G-P-M API sorted, perhaps using GConversation.

Definition in file gpm-dbus-server.c.
